name: ASP.NET Example - OJC
short_description:
I produced this project to show my skills in ASP.NET, C#, CSHTML/HTML, CSS & SQL.

The website was developed in Web Matrix 3. Currently the software has a bug where you are unable to enter data into database tables. I however got around this by producing SQL INSERT queries.

I have published the website for easy viewing, see below. On the homepage you will also find an 'ingredients' list with links to .txt code listings.

http://oliverjamescarr-001-site1.smarterasp.net/
